sentence.Network_en: Howbeit they did not hearken, but they did after their former manner.
sentence.Network_cn: 40他们却不听从, 仍照先前的风俗去行.

sentence.Network_en: Gate of the Vanquisher of all Evil Spells, Hearken and Open!
sentence.Network_cn: 一切邪咒征服者之门, 聆听并开启!

sentence.Network_en: To hearken to the voice of conscience is a good rule.
sentence.Network_cn: 倾听良心的呼声是一个很好的准则.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... headlong 轻率的>深思熟虑的 hearken 倾听>不理睬 hedonist 享乐主义者>禁欲者.

list.abs: 西蒙（男子名）[男子名] [英格兰人姓氏] 西蒙来源于希伯来语人名，含义是“聆听”(to hearken) 昵称Sim,Simkin,Simmy；[地名] [澳大利亚] 西蒙
but to be learned is good if they hearken unto the counsels of God .然而，如果他们听从神的忠告，那有学问则是好事。
and God hearkened unto Leah , and she conceived , and bare Jacob the fifth son .17神应允了利亚，他就怀孕，给雅各生了第五个儿子。
but if ye will not hearken unto me , and will not do all these commandments ., 你们若不听从我 , 不遵行我的诫命.

jx.jx_en_mean: another way of saying hark back (see hark)

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English heorcnian; probably related to hark. The spelling with ea (dating from the 16th cent.) is due to association with hear

means.word_mean: 1. listen; used mostly in the imperative
